security_audit.summary: All 52 static findings are FALSE POSITIVES. The code is a legitimate content verification tool that reads markdown files, calls Anthropic API for viral potential analysis, and writes results locally. No shell execution, path traversal exploits, or credential exfiltration present. Template literals were misidentified as shell backticks, and standard file operations were flagged as filesystem risks.

content.user_title: Verify viral potential of content with AI analysis
content.value_statement: Content often fails to gain traction because it lacks key viral elements. This skill uses AI to score your content on curiosity gaps, emotional triggers, and storytelling impact, then rewrites it for maximum engagement.
actual_capabilities: Analyzes content against 6 key viral factors (curiosity gap, emotional resonance, value, timeliness, pacing, novelty)
Scores content on viral potential with detailed 0-100 rating scale
Identifies specific weaknesses and provides targeted improvement suggestions
Rewrites content using Defou x Stanley style for maximum viral impact
Supports batch processing of multiple files from source directory
limitations: Requires Anthropic API key for AI analysis features
Currently optimized for short-form content like tweets and social posts
Cannot verify content that requires real-time data or current events
Output quality depends on input content quality and length

use_cases.title: Optimize post performance
use_cases.description: Transform average social posts into high-engagement viral content with AI-powered scoring and rewriting.

use_cases.title: Validate content strategy
use_cases.description: Run existing content through viral verification before publishing to maximize reach and engagement metrics.

use_cases.title: Enhance headline impact
use_cases.description: Analyze and rewrite newsletter openers and hooks to improve click-through rates and subscriber engagement.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Verification
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the viral-verification skill to analyze this content and score its viral potential.

prompt_templates.title: Batch Processing
prompt_templates.prompt: Run viral-verification on all markdown files in the outputs/defou-stanley-posts directory to identify which posts need improvement.

prompt_templates.title: Rewrite Request
prompt_templates.prompt: Use viral-verification to not only score this content but provide a complete rewritten version optimized for maximum engagement.

prompt_templates.title: Factor Analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Run viral-verification with detailed analysis of all 6 viral factors including specific examples of what works and what needs improvement.

output_examples.input: Check if this tweet is viral-ready: 'Great tips on productivity. Check out our blog for more.'
output: Weaknesses: Lacks curiosity gap, no emotional trigger, generic opening
Recommendations: Add specific number, create urgency, include personal angle
Provide complete content including title and body for accurate viral scoring
Use the rewritten output as a starting point and add your own voice
Run multiple variations through verification to compare scores before publishing
Review the detailed factor analysis to understand why content scored as it did
Don't rely solely on viral score without reading the detailed analysis
Avoid using the skill without an Anthropic API key configured
Don't skip the improvement suggestions - they contain actionable advice
Avoid testing very short content (under 50 words) as scoring may be unreliable

output.question: What viral factors does this skill analyze?
output.answer: Six key factors: curiosity gap, emotional resonance, value/utility, timeliness, storytelling pacing, and novelty/counter-intuition.

output.question: What does the viral score mean?
output.answer: A 0-100 score where 70+ indicates strong viral potential, 40-60 needs improvement, and below 40 requires significant rewriting.

output.question: Can I use this for long-form content?
output.answer: It works best on short-form content like tweets, posts, and newsletters. Long-form content may receive less detailed analysis.

output.question: How long does verification take?
output.answer: Each file takes 10-30 seconds depending on content length. Batch processing with multiple files runs concurrently (2 at a time).

output.question: What is the Defou x Stanley style?
output.answer: A minimalist, sharp writing style with strong hooks, short sentences, and high insight density popular in growth hacking circles.

output.question: Do I need API credentials?
output.answer: Yes, an Anthropic API key is required. Set ANTHROPIC_API_KEY in your .env file or environment variables.
